detectors.description:
BentoToken._writeCheckpoint(address,uint32,uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BentoToken.sol#969-987) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- nCheckpoints > 0 && checkpoints[delegatee][nCheckpoints - 1].fromBlock == blockNumber (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BentoToken.sol#979)
detectors.markdown:
[BentoToken._writeCheckpoint(address,uint32,uint256,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BentoToken.sol#L969-L987) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- [nCheckpoints > 0 && checkpoints[delegatee][nCheckpoints - 1].fromBlock == blockNumber](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BentoToken.sol#L979)

detectors.description:
ERC20.constructor(string,string).name (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BentoToken.sol#445) shadows:
	- ERC20.name() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BentoToken.sol#454-456) (function)

ERC20.constructor(string,string).symbol (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BentoToken.sol#445) shadows:
	- ERC20.symbol() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BentoToken.sol#462-464) (function)

BentoToken.delegateBySig(address,uint256,uint256,uint8,bytes32,bytes32) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BentoToken.sol#835-876) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(now <= expiry,BENTO::delegateBySig: signature expired) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BentoToken.sol#874)
detectors.markdown:
[BentoToken.delegateBySig(address,uint256,uint256,uint8,bytes32,bytes32)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BentoToken.sol#L835-L876) uses timestamp for comparisons
